given.text:
Nicole is an extremely talented marketing leader. She possesses an amazing ability to balance long term vision with a 'roll up her sleeves' focus on results. She is fearless about trying out new ideas; I have long admired her willingness to challenge the comfortable routines of the company and encourage or directly drive major improvements across many departments. It's hard to overstate her contributions to the company. Direct but patient, intelligent but humble, driven but thoughtful; you'd be hard pressed to find another Nicole so I highly recommend that you work with her if you get the chance.
…
See more

Michael's a talented community builder with a real passion for what he does. He was a major force in reinvigorating our MongoDB User Groups and our developer-focused web properties. It was a pleasure working with him at MongoDB.
